subject: Sleep
title: Work Stress and Adult Sleep
description: A fast breakdown of Work Stress and Adult Sleep for builders.

hook.text: Your body is in bed but your mind is at the office, replaying tomorrow's presentation on an endless loop.

buildup.text: Work stress is the number one cause of adult insomnia in industrialized countries.

discovery.text: Stress activates the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis, flooding the body with cortisol at bedtime.

twist.text: High evening cortisol directly suppresses deep sleep and fragments sleep cycles throughout the night.

climax.text: The result is a vicious cycle: stress causes bad sleep, bad sleep causes worse stress, and on it goes.

punchline.text: The hardest part of work might be leaving it at the office.

quiz.question: How does work stress affect sleep physiology?
options: Cortisol suppresses deep sleep and fragments cycles
